name: 鄧陳興
objective:
本課程適用於一般大專之決策分析課程。其目的在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。本課程授課主題包括：不考慮機率之決策問題、與機率有關之決策問題、獲取額外資訊之決策分析、效益分析、遊戲理論。相關之授課內容包括：機率分配、期望值方法、貝氏分析、完全資訊與額外資訊之期望值。
1.「決策分析:方法與應用」希望能引導同學們對於所有管理活動必須面對的課題，一般企業每天面對的決策問題不盡相同，但其基本構成的元素卻大同小異，包括目標、方案、評估準則以及決策者主觀價值等，讓學生能在「作中學」，以培養學生具備「實用」和「基本」的決策評估與選擇方案過程的知識。
Decision Analysis is a course to help student to handle the management activities with management skill. In general, although the enterprises have met many different decision problems; however, the basic elements have the same characteristics. It includes objective, solution program, evaluation criteria, and main values of decision-making, etc. Our course will let students ‘learn from doing exercises’ to cultivate the ‘real’ and ‘basic’ decision-making knowledge and skill.
2.決策分析的方法:包括：多準則決策分析方法、計量決策分析方法、定性決策分析方法與其他；共15章分別敘述。
The methodology of decision analysis includes multi-criteria decision analysis and data envlope analysis. The totals are 15 chapters included.
3.課程設計包括決策實際案例之研討與如何透過各種決策方法，解決周遭的管理問題與自己所面臨的問題，以激勵學生反思，提昇學習成效。
The course design will include physical case study and how to use the methodology of decision-making to solve your facing surrounding problems. We hope to urge you reflect yourself from the basic beginning of learning and get the most benefits from the decision-making.
4. Group Discussion
The group topics are given raw materials for your report and are separated with the following 17 categories with three students as a team:
A) Clean Tech; B) Cloud Computing; C) Communication & Network;  D) Crisis Analysis; E) Cross Strait Market Analysis; F) Digital Content; G) Electronic Vehicle; H) Female Economy; I) IA; J) ICT; K) Innovation Change for New Market; L) ITS; M) Local Area Market; N) New Market Observation; O) Overall Economy; P) PC; and Q) Security.
i) Group leader is requested to organize a team to discuss, to find and to write a ppt report from the raw materials.
ii) The questionnaires design is required to invest the opinions from the classmates in this class.
B)Each Team shall select one of the methods of Analytic Hierarchy Process (AHP) or Data Envelopment Analysis (DEA) to investigate the opinions of classmate.
5.Individual report is requested to select one of the topics of the given Harvard Business Report (HBR), which can NOT be repeatedly to each other. The group topic and selected topic are needed to register to the Class Leader in this class before midterm test.
6. Three quizzes are given to make sure everybody understand the Operational Research text book and some concepts of Multicriteria Decision Analysis.
